Payroll Management, Simplified

Discover the features that make payroll processing stress-free.

Automated Salary Calculation

Automatically calculate salaries, including deductions, bonuses, and overtime. Eliminate manual errors and save hours of work.

Statutory Compliance (PF, ESI, PT)

Stay compliant with the latest regulations. Our software handles PF, ESI, TDS, and PT calculations and generates all required reports.

Leave & Attendance Integration

Integrate with biometric systems or use our online portal to manage attendance, track leaves, and sync data for payroll processing.

Employee Self-Service Portal

Empower your employees to view payslips, submit investment declarations, and check leave balances online.

Secure & Confidential

Your company and employee data is protected with multiple layers of security, ensuring complete confidentiality.

Comprehensive Reporting

Generate payslips, salary statements, compliance forms, and custom reports with just a few clicks.

Focus on People, Not Paperwork

Manual payroll is prone to errors and consumes valuable time. Another Head Payroll automates the entire process, ensuring accuracy and compliance, so your HR team can focus on strategic initiatives that matter.

  • Always Up-to-Date: We keep track of changing tax laws and compliance rules so you don't have to.
  • Scales With You: From 5 employees to 500, our software grows with your business.
  • Great Value: Get enterprise-level payroll features at a price that fits your budget.
